channel.title: Talks on Data Se
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Data Se

item.title: Talk - Populism in tweets of German politicians (talk at DGPs 2018)
item.description: The slides of my talk Populism in tweets of German politicians can be found here http://data-se.netlify.com/slides/populist-twitter/populist-twitter-dgps2018.html#1. Data, code, and more can be found at Github: https://github.com/sebastiansauer/polits_tweet_mining

item.title: Reproducible academic writing with RMarkdown - Talk at DGPs 2018
item.description: Talk at DGPs 2018. Get slides here: http://data-se.netlify.com/slides/rmd-writing/rmd-writing_dgps2018.html.

item.title: Talk - Predictors of AfD party success in the 2017 elections. A Bayesian modeling approach
item.description: Talk at DGPs 2018. Get slides here http://data-se.netlify.com/slides/afd_dgps2018/afd_dgps2018.html
